author: mturk
msg: Use apr_socket_t as proto for socket callback to make compilers

author: mturk
msg: Add --enable-maintainer-mode to the configure options, so that
statistics gets compiled in when configure is called with that option.

author: mturk
msg: Add transport metricks when compiled with TRACE support.

author: mturk
msg: Use auto pool management for Socket.accept.
On each accept the socket's child pool is created and assigned
